Description:
1 x improvement notice - IN/22/3/22/8/RGC/1 (312444917) - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety and welfare of your employees.
You have failed to ensure that exposure to substances hazardous to health is prevented or adequately controlled because there are insufficient control measures in place to protect all employees who are in the workshop from exposure to welding fume.

1 x improvement notice - IN/22/3/22/8/RGC/2 (312445006) - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety and welfare of your employees. You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the blades of your guillotine because it is possible to access the blades from the back of the machine whilst the machine is in operation. This gives rise to the possibility of bodily contact with the moving parts.
